title: Riot gegen Scarra
body:
** NO MORE SCARRA BUSH:** Wards that are targeted within 25 units of the brush will now seek out and plant themselves into the brush instead 

Riot in den Patchnotizen.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Gv4swGEKNXg
http://euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-524-notes
